General.Name: City Cement Co
General.Description: City Cement Company engages in the production and sale of cement in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company provides ordinary Portland cement for construction and plastering works, concrete pipe, and block and tile industry; and concrete structure works. It also offers sulphate resistant cement for waste water treatment plants, ports and costal platform, and dams and infrastructure. In addition, the company engages in the operation of radioactive devices of the plant, processing waste, industrial, agricultural, and municipal waste, as well as produces alternative fuels. City Cement Company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
